Text: Tozzini Freire Invitation th anniversaryAs part of the festivities of the th anniversary of Tozzini Freire Teixeira e Silva Advogados the firm has the pleasure of inviting you to the cocktail party that will open the exhibition of the works of the French artist Auguste Rodin in Sao Paulo Brazil The event will be held at Pinacoteca do Estado de Sao Paulo on the evening of the th of September Please find details in the attached file invitationrodinexe Shortly you will be receiving the invitation by mail Yours Sincerely Tozzini Freire Teixeira e Silva Advogados Sao Paulo Brazil
